remarks: Add join to both sides of a lattice ordering.  ( ~ chlej1i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latlej.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latlej.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latlej.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latjlej1 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y -> ( X .\/ Z ) .<_ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
